title: Necrophage
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A vile undead creation of the most unholy necromancy, made from the decaying corpses of humanoid creatures. It exists to spread disease and decay. |

## Useful Info

**Necrophages** are grotesque undead. Their melee attacks have a chance of [draining](/Drain "Drain") your max HP with every hit. They only generate inside certain [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- If you find one in early Dungeon, they can be threatening to [Alchemists](/Alchemist "Alchemist") and [Necromancers](/Necromancer "Necromancer"), since they are immune to poison/negative energy.
- They're fragile enough that almost anyone can defeat them from a distance with ranged attacks.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), necrophages will no longer appear in the Dungeon, and they will exist only as [Yred](/Yred "Yred") allies. Also, necrophages will have less HP and a weaker melee attack, 8 -> 6.
- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), necrophages could spawn in the early [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon").
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), necrophages inflicted [rot](/Rot "Rot") instead of draining.
- Prior to [0.24](/0.24 "0.24"), followers of [Fedhas Madash](/Fedhas_Madash "Fedhas Madash") could instantly destroy them with the Fungal Bloom ability.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), necrophages could eat corpses to heal.
- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), necrophages could equip weapons and armour.
html:
Necrophage

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
necrophage n 
HP 18-37
HD 5
XP 122
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 10
Will 40
Attack1 8 (hit: drain experience)


Resistances rC+
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type ghoul, necrophage
Flags Evil
Unbreathing
No zombie
A vile undead creation of the most unholy necromancy, made from the decaying corpses of humanoid creatures. It exists to spread disease and decay.

Useful Info

Necrophages are grotesque undead. Their melee attacks have a chance of draining your max HP with every hit. They only generate inside certain vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • If you find one in early Dungeon, they can be threatening to Alchemists and Necromancers, since they are immune to poison/negative energy.
  • They're fragile enough that almost anyone can defeat them from a distance with ranged attacks.

History

  • In 0.32, necrophages will no longer appear in the Dungeon, and they will exist only as Yred allies. Also, necrophages will have less HP and a weaker melee attack, 8 -> 6.
  • Prior to 0.30, necrophages could spawn in the early Dungeon.
  • Prior to 0.26, necrophages inflicted rot instead of draining.
  • Prior to 0.24, followers of Fedhas Madash could instantly destroy them with the Fungal Bloom ability.
  • Prior to 0.16, necrophages could eat corpses to heal.
  • Prior to 0.15, necrophages could equip weapons and armour.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Necrophage&oldid=79315"

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Necrophages''' are grotesque undead. Their melee attacks have a chance of [[drain]]ing your max HP with every hit. They only generate inside certain [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you find one in early Dungeon, they can be threatening to [[Alchemist]]s and [[Necromancer]]s, since they are immune to poison/negative energy.
*They're fragile enough that almost anyone can defeat them from a distance with ranged attacks.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|necrophages will no longer appear in the Dungeon, and they will exist only as [[Yred]] allies. Also, necrophages will have less HP and a weaker melee attack, 8 -> 6.}}
*Prior to [[0.30]], necrophages could spawn in the early [[Dungeon]].
*Prior to [[0.26]], necrophages inflicted [[rot]] instead of draining.
*Prior to [[0.24]], followers of [[Fedhas Madash]] could instantly destroy them with the Fungal Bloom ability.
*Prior to [[0.16]], necrophages could eat corpses to heal.
*Prior to [[0.15]], necrophages could equip weapons and armour.
